overview: Kayden Kross is a good girl tired of seeing her slutty roommate Angelina Valentine have all the fun. Angelina's sex filled romps have girlfriends Kagney Linn Karter and Alexis Venton following in her loose and hardcore ways. How long before Kayden gives into the temptation of casual sex and one night stands? This good girl is about to go bad and take a walk on the wild side.
tagline: Just How Filthy Can A Clean Girl Get?
title: Wild Side
